headline: Is Baxter International Offering Long Term Value After Years of Share Price Declines?
summary: Wondering if Baxter International is a beaten down healthcare name or a genuine value opportunity at today’s price? Let’s unpack what the market might be missing. The stock has inched up 2.3% over the last week and 3.6% over the past month, but that is against a much steeper backdrop with returns of -35.4% year to date and a -74.0% slide over five years. Investors have been reacting to Baxter’s ongoing portfolio reshaping, including moves to streamline its medical products business and...
